website_summaries.verdict: A hand file set that enables you to sharpen and deburr soft metal, jewelry, and much more.
pros: Nonslip grips provide superior control and handling
Teeth are precision milled for maximum quality
Includes files in a broad assortment of shapes, ensuring you can use the set for myriad applications
cons: Handles are very cheap and flimsy
Teeth are coarse in comparison to those associated with other hand file sets

customer_reviews.title: Nice file set
customer_reviews.text: I searched Amazon for a file set to keep my lawn mower blade sharp. This file set appears to be the right set for the job. The main large flat file is the one that I was looking for. It is just the right size and the kit contains several other files that will come in handy for other medium size jobs. The set comes in a nylon roll with individual pockets for each file. Quality is what I needed for my purposes which are around the house and not large scale commercial jobs. It's a nice set for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark O.

customer_reviews.title: Files even thick metal like truck bumpers
customer_reviews.text: Work great even on harder metals. On one job I had to shave down a hole I put through my trucks bumper. I had no issues at all filing it down to exactly how I wanted it. Bumper was maybe 1/8" thick±. I'll update my review to see how they hold up over times. The main one I used for the bumper job was either getting slightly dull or I was getting really tired after filing for an hour haha
customer_reviews.author: Mitsu

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well made, work perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I paid so little for these great files. They're not too light or too heavy, handle is great, feels solid. Work really well. I especially like the small ones, I'm not good with wood but it makes me look good because of the results. I'll check their other products if I can. A recommended buy! 5/5
customer_reviews.author: zapper_the_man

customer_reviews.title: Great set of files
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of files and for the money they can't be beat in my option. They are well made cut very quick and clean and are very comfortable in your hand. I feel if they are kept rd clean and taken of they will last a very long time. The storage roll is a very handy feature as well. The customer support has been great to. They checked in to be sure the package was delivered on time and wanted me to be sure if there were any problems they would be there to address them. I would definitely recommend these to any one looking for a great set of files at a great price. Tim
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great value and excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: I think these files represent a great value for the money. I'm using them mostly for hobby purposes on wood and plastic as well as general homeowner things like sharpening lawnmower blades, etc. Also, the seller provides excellent service. I did receive a defective file in my first shipment, the seller was very responsive in replacing it and keeping me up to date through the whole process. What could have been an unpleasant experience became a chance for their service to shine!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Best general file set I've seen in a while.
customer_reviews.text: This file set is excellent. Nice sturdy canvas carrying pouch. Nine nice case-hardened steel files (6 small, 3 medium size) in standard popular formats. Rugged and attractive (nylon or hard plastic?) safety handles intact on the files. Very glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D. Prince

customer_reviews.title: ... tool set but once they arrived I was in love. They feel great and work even better
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous ordering such a cheap tool set but once they arrived I was in love. They feel great and work even better. Definitely would order them again if I lost them today.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Well made file set in good selection of shapes and sizes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice file set in very useful sizes and shapes. Seem very well made. Handles are comfortable and fit solidly. Replaced my old rusty files with no handles. I really like the small files for crafts and smaller size projects.
customer_reviews.author: Gold River Pete

customer_reviews.title: A+ The Very Best!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, files feel very good and sharp. Great value. Solid product. Made right here in the US of A. Definitely recommend purchasing. Fantastic product & customer service. Really good price. A+
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Pernich

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. I've only used a couple of the files in this set so far but they worked perfectly. Mostly for deburring or taking off a sharp edge. The logo on the handles appeared to be scratched off almost looking used but isn't that what tools are for to be used? Who really cares if the handles aren't pristine. The set was new, has a nice pouch to hold them and does the job great.
customer_reviews.author: subzerorider

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I'm a novice at best and looking for some simple tools that won't set me back 80 dollars each Several of the smaller files have bent or tilted ends, one of the large files is not evenly set in the handle, making me use it at an angle. Neither of these problems ruin the product or prevent me from using it. Its also a very cheap set and I do feel that it was worth the money. No real problems, I mean come on, its a stick of metal with groves. 4/5 for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handles Come off fairly easily
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because the handles come off I just blast them out with air mix up some 2 part epoxy fill the handle and jam the steel back in wipe off the extra comes out looking professional and will probably never come out again
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend based on already having used several to fine tune ...
customer_reviews.text: This file set is a quality set added to my extensive tool box. Yes, I do recommend based on already having used several to fine tune lawn cutting blades... and honing a few wood projects.
customer_reviews.author: XXXXXXXX

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: A quality set of files with every imaginable size. The enclosed pouch has two holes for hanging which I did on the pegboard in my garage. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: A M V B

customer_reviews.title: Great File Set
customer_reviews.text: Very great files that I have here. I used them to file bearing edges on PVC drums. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden D

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was perfect, includes a nylon tool roll to keep the ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was perfect, includes a nylon tool roll to keep the files organized once you throw the box away. I've only used these lightly thus far, but the files are sharp and precise. Removing 1/4' of G10 material from some handle scales was a quick and the results were exactly what I was looking for. Nice variety of sizes and shapes for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex T.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda what I expected
customer_reviews.text: the bigger files are junk, but the little ones are awesome. The big files seem like they aren’t cut deep enough, or grooves are to close together. I couldn’t get them grab or really cut they seem like they just skim the surface. If somehow they could make the big ones course and aggressive like the little ones in this kit, they would be onto something. You’re better off buying this kit just for the smaller files and then spending probably triple this amount for a some actual quality full sized files but hey the $27 buck were worth it. NOT MADE IN USA!
customer_reviews.author: Big daddy 42

customer_reviews.title: It was about time...
customer_reviews.text: The only things lacking in my tool chest was a multi-purpose file set. I was recommended to this brand by a satisfied neighbor. The moment the set arrived, one of the files went straight into action. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: CubanoLibre

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product worth every penny. Also unbeatable customer service. Can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: dwdtack

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp - nice stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp - work very well. Not sure about longevity, but they've done well for the few jobs I've used them for.
customer_reviews.author: Art K.

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Used the half round file on mild steel for thirty minutes and the file grooves wore off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great file set for all of your needs.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and have held up really well. Used them for some aluminum work, but have ended up using them on a couple of wood projects, as well. Customer service from seller was outstanding, with great after purchase follow-up. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I needed some files, for light "around the house" duty, but I didn't want to spend a lot of money. I think these fit the bill just fine. I let the kids use them, a neighbor borrowed one, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Alley

customer_reviews.title: They fit very comfortably in my hand and seem to be well made
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I noticed that instead of a half round file, there were two flat files in the package. I contacted the seller and they very quickly and generously corrected the issue. They fit very comfortably in my hand and seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I like the set but came missing the 3 small files that are in the picture on the bottom left of the tool organizer. It came looking used as well.
customer_reviews.author: rfwright

customer_reviews.title: Yes well worth it
customer_reviews.text: These came in handy. My husband is in construction and constantly using them. He aaid they work good and gets the job. He was very happy with them and they have something to hold them in. Would definitely purchase again. Great father's day gift!
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH MCMURREY

customer_reviews.title: Good files for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Files are as described and work well. Be advised the small files are made of brittle metal and will snap if too much side force is placed on them.
customer_reviews.author: Glycon

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: All the files I needed and more for a great price. The handles are comfortable and the files work like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this file set in 2017 and have used infrequently since then. Today, I noticed that all the small files have developed considerable rust near the handles. I found this surprising because my garage is heated and air-conditioned. And I have other files 3+ decades old that have not developed rust. On the finer files, the burrs are pretty much gone after only moderate usage. These files looks great but the pouch is likely the best part of the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, well made
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my father as a gift.... he loves it! These files are well made and strong. He’s used it for several things around the house: lawn mower blades, shears, and wood items. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive everything in the picture, box was opened and was disappointed about that. The ones I did get we're decent
customer_reviews.author: Toph

customer_reviews.title: Fun new toy
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set. The bag (roll?) that comes with it isn't the most user-friendly container, but it's fine. The files work well and got the job done. I like having the different sizes. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danyah

customer_reviews.title: Good set of files
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed some small hand files. They are well made and high quality. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tolliver

customer_reviews.title: This item as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Being that the item was a gift, I can't say whether it works as described but I can say the recipient was very pleased and was anxious to try the files.
customer_reviews.author: jayraysmom

customer_reviews.title: Good set of files for the average handyman.
customer_reviews.text: Variety of files in this sleeve has met all the needs I have in the work I do. Am happy to own these.
customer_reviews.author: K Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of files!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of files in a handy roll up pouch. The files are reasonably sharp, work well and do not clog up. I sharpened a couple of sets of quality mower blades, it took some time but the sharpened areas look clean and are sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: good for the $
customer_reviews.text: tidy carrying case with pouches...clean and well made. Ive used on wood and metal and been happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used them as much as I intended but was ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them as much as I intended but was impressed with the case it came in and the quality of the files.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really picky about my files which I use for wood projects. This 9-piece from INNOVANT are the best I've owned as of yet! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: David Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: A nice set
customer_reviews.text: The handles feel a little cheap but are comfortable and holding up well. The printing on handles rubs off very easily. I use these in the machine shop where I work and so far are doing the job well and holding up solid.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I go through a lot of files and these are fine for a homeowner with the odd handy job, but for heavy use I suspect they won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Slander

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be okay
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for some holiday hobbies and also for my husband. Packaging was torn when it arrived and the files actually looked dirty. One of the logos on one of the larger files was smeared and 2 of the smaller ones looked to have the tips bent.. none of the other files had kinks or bends and after looking at it closer it didn’t look like they should have been bent either. Other than that they look good, I haven’t had a chance to use them yet but they seem like they’ll be good for hobbies maybe not so much for my husband for his work.
customer_reviews.author: kelli

customer_reviews.title: Serendipity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set mainly for the large files expecting the small files to be toy-like. I was surprised the small ones are made as well as the large ones and remove quite a bit of metal in tight areas.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great price for so many pieces. I like the zipper holder it comes in. It’s good quality and seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: alexa h markiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Good value for what you get buried
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, a variety of options, would buy again if I needed another set.
customer_reviews.author: NottaReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, durable... that's all that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, durable...that's all that I need. I use them for carving and shaping wood as a base for mosaic sculptures.
customer_reviews.author: Michele86

customer_reviews.title: Work well so far
customer_reviews.text: A good set for someone like me who doesn't need a file regularly and just added it to my tool kit.
customer_reviews.author: Bean Town

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Was missing 3 of the smaller files on delivery and snapped the tip of one of the smaller files off during very light use. If i were to do it again id save and buy two or three higher quality files. For thirty bucks i should have known better
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed and is a compliment to my tools. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice file set... what can you say, it is what it is.... The only negative is the case or pouch. If you take the files in and out often, the case frays easily.
customer_reviews.author: Aziza

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Great files! I have used them a few times since I bought them. Look forward to breaking them in a little more. The sellers were very professional and asked if I was satisfied with the product and made sure it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing files. I had to file down strike plate to match the bolt while installing a door. Worked great. I use them for just about every project so I dont even really put them away anymore. Very strong files. Awesome product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My mom does a ton of projects from furniture to crafty signs. She absolutely loves these files. She saves a lot of time with these and they stay sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Groveland

customer_reviews.text: We first used it with our kitchen knives and then my husbands ventured outside and used them with our mower blade. Super easy, AFFORDABLE and compact. Great for traveling up north to our cabin with for the rest of needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki D

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: We havent used them yet, but my husband just picked up a woodworking hobby and is so excited to use these! He feels like the quality is great, especially for the price point! The variety of sizes is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle Foster

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortasble to use
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few chances to use these to sharpen some weeded metal blade attachments. The handles are durable and comfortable. They're just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Talker

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It worked on all of our tools and for every size. It sharpened them perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Krystina Bolster

customer_reviews.title: Good Set of File
customer_reviews.text: Its a good file set. but would of been better if it came with better way to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set did well on the project precision files were awesome very good product
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wise

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Used the smaller triangular to file touch of the edges on a brass dovetail. Also the fat bastard to file down about .15 inch of brass. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: DaniLee14

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much because of the great price but these are nice files. I am a machining student and these are a nice addition to my tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Files are well made. They enable me​ to remove metal burrs and shape wood pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good All around
customer_reviews.text: I needed a set of files to cover basic needs. These files are very good quality with nice ergonomic handles and nice canvas roll up storage. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marcellus

customer_reviews.title: Over two years of use
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a long time in a jewelry crafting setting. See picture. Very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price point.
customer_reviews.text: They file stuff... Have not broken yet. Some bad machining but cheap = lower quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Handle files not bad
customer_reviews.text: I use to file down some plastic. Files work great a little on the cheap side. But the still did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Jara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good strong metal and groves. Will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: acts

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It was a great gift to my brother. He had an old set that was on it's last leg so we gave him this set as a gift. He loves them and is now using them in his shop. Great quality and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: So far , so good. The files are exactly what I wanted and work well up to this time.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Seem to hold up well. Not made out of cheap material. My husband uses them at work and hasnt had an issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use these frequently. They come with a case, which is nice too. Good set.
customer_reviews.author: E.G.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for the price. Works well and seems to be made pretty sturdy. They should last for years to come. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Morris

customer_reviews.title: This purchase is a great value for the price. The file set is top notch.
customer_reviews.text: Have used the files multiple times in the past few weeks to sharpen Axes, Mower blades, and metal shaping. The files are sharp, show no wear, and come with comfortable/durable handles and a carry/storage case. I would definitely buy these again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Will Good

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of files for multiple uses in a convenient case.
customer_reviews.author: Audra K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafters
customer_reviews.text: These files work great for my hobby of making signs. I’m not much of a wood worker but for the money they are great for my hobby. I will be excited to see how they work on my coffee table I’m redoing and future projects.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Thomasma

customer_reviews.title: These files are great for any project!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these files. I bought them to do little projects and they are great! They are good quality and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Annalia Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks sturdy and come with a pouch to put the tools in.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Missing files
customer_reviews.text: Sealed box was missing all the small files. The larger files seem to be good quality, the handles are comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks good! They seem like really nice files. I will update once I have tried them.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive all of the correct files.
customer_reviews.text: Set was missing the large half round file. Instead I got 2 large flat files.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be good quality. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnie Springs Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Great files
customer_reviews.text: The files work great! I have used many other files and they all seem to wear out half way through a project. Not these! I completed a project and the file appears to have hardly even been used. Highly recommend! Even comes with a nice case!
customer_reviews.author: Treetop

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The files were perfect for the small project I had. They were comfortable in my hand and stood up great.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Z

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for some metal filing on a motorcycle frame and absolutely love them. They're super durable, stiff, and have comfortable handles that haven't slipped off the way many do, and the value is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse L Fahrenkrog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they work very well. I'm going to buy another set

customer_reviews.title: Probably just fine for wood work
customer_reviews.text: Metal is pretty soft and cutting edges don't seem very sharp, i wouldn't buy these for metal work, best used for wood

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good files.so far serm to hold an edge although i got 2 of the small triangular files and not one of the small square

customer_reviews.title: There are seriously good value for money
customer_reviews.text: There are seriously good value for money. Needed a set urgently for fixing something I messed up in a woodworking project.

customer_reviews.title: Awful

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and friendly service.
customer_reviews.text: Silver Tree International was very involved and made sure I received my package. They made sure I was happy with my purchase. The quality of the files is superb, I intend to buy from them again in the future.

customer_reviews.text: Handles came off several of the files, holster is very cheap. Files worked ok but not for any major jobs.

customer_reviews.text: High quality files that I can tell will last a long time.

customer_reviews.title: but they are good quality and sharp
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the flat and half-round large files, but they are good quality and sharp. I tried them on a mild steel pipe and a weld. Welds are often very hard metal. The files cut the pipe rapidly and the weld without dulling, but I don't think it was a particularly hard weld metal. I'm happy with the purchase just to have the two files I have used. If the rest of the files are as good, this is an excellent set to buy.

The file set was a great asset to my tools and my encounters with Nate have been nothing but amazing. Thank you Nate and your family's business practices. Would not hesitate to buy again or recommend.
